periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 95, with temperatures falling to around 91 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 103. Northwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
